def: One of a group of shooting stars which appear yearly about the10th of August, and cross the heavens in paths apparently radiatingfrom the constellation Perseus. They are beleived to be fragmentsonce connected with a comet visible in 1862.
Risk of injury, destruction, or loss by the sea, or while atsea.
Twisted; bent; -- said of a dolphin haurient, which forms afigure like the letter S.
Any one of a series of complex nitrogenous bases obtained bythe union of certain aniline derivatives with glyoxal or with certainketones. [Written also chinoxaline.]
; sing. Mandingo. (Ethnol.) An extensive and powerful tribe ofWest African negroes.
One who countenances, favors, or supports.
One who welds, or unites pieces of iron, etc., by welding.
In an abnormal manner; irregularly. Darwin.
